JOB DESCRIPTION:
We re looking for a talented, dedicated Software Developer for travel portal development. Working as part of our lively and expert development team, as Software Developer, you will have a key role in developing, managing and delivering high quality web applications with additional responsibility for the technical quality of production and delivery of development on- time. The ideal candidate will be dedicated, have a real passion for digital technology and enjoy working as part of a team.

Candidate must have minimum 3- 4 years of experience in a similar role.

Skills required: 

Should have knowledge of HTML,HTML5, CSS, CSS3 and responsive. 

Proficient in technologies like JavaScript and other UI frameworks. 

Work experience in any framework like Yii and Laravel. Experience in Yii 2 is preferred. 

Work primarily with Object- oriented design,Unit testing techniques, debugging techniques, HTTP, MySQL and Apache. 

Experience in NodeJs, Angular and JSON (added advantage). 

Experience with source code repositories and continuous deployment process (Required). 

Strong ability to work independently. 

Knowledge in Linux/ Ubuntu OS and basic commands. 

Knowledge in shell script. 

Good verbal and written communication skill. Notice period: 15- 30 days 

A valid email address is required.
